<NEW - DINOBOT>

DINOBOT paused as he quietly listen=
ed, "Keep most of our forces in reserve.  Put on a show of cooperation and =
let the Maximals take the brunt of it.  When the situation is dealt with, s=

Then grinning, "And perhpas we =
can make a..  An exchange in return for the truce and our cooperation that =
they will have to pay to weaken and divide them further. In return for our =
assistance, we should request an intact stasis pod with sparked protoform t=
o remake toa  Predacon.  If they want our assistane then they can pay a pri=
ce for it while at the same time dividing thier own troops by having to pay=

VICE GRIP pondered, =
